name: Pinch
headline: Take video calls and host webinars in any language
description: Pinch is a video conferencing platform that delivers split-second translation with synchronized lip movements and natural expressions, so you can conduct calls and webinars in 20+ languages and appear as a native speaker.  Pinch creates an AI version of you in real-time, with a focus on presenting you accurately and professionally.  Unlock new markets and authentic connections — join Pinch!

founders.name: Keyu Chen, Founder
founders.description:
Co-founder , CTO @ Pinch

Previously Research Lead @ Tavus (YC S21), AI Researcher @ Shanghai AI Lab, Netease Games.
7+ years of AI research / applied engineering experiences, 10+ papers, focusing on multi-modal LLMs, digital human, video and audio generation.

founders.name: Christian Safka, Founder
founders.description:
Building Pinch!

Previously founding engineer -> Head of ML @ Tavus (S21)
Ex-PM @ Microsoft
Zero to one software and ML products for 10 years

generated_description:
**Pinch: Breaking Language Barriers with AI-Powered Video Conferencing**

Founded in 2024 and part of Y Combinator Batch W25, Pinch is reshaping the way we communicate across different languages. With a passionate team of just three people, they’ve harnessed advanced AI to make video calls and webinars accessible in over 20 languages, ensuring that you can engage confidently and naturally, no matter the language being spoken.

### What Makes Pinch Unique?

At its core, Pinch's mission is simple: make video calls and webinars seamless and multilingual. They achieve this through:

- **Real-time Translation**: Say goodbye to hiring interpreters. Pinch delivers instant translation across 20+ languages, making global communication a breeze.
  
- **Lip Sync Technology**: The platform doesn’t just translate your words; it synchronizes your lip movements with the translated speech. This means you’ll look and sound like a native speaker.

- **Natural Expressions**: Pinch goes beyond voice; it preserves your facial expressions and emotions, making conversations feel real and engaging.

- **Global Webinars**: Whether it's a casual chat or a formal presentation, you can host multilingual webinars comfortably with hundreds of participants.

- **Security & Privacy**: Concerned about confidentiality? Pinch offers enterprise-grade security, ensuring that your meetings remain private.

### Join the Revolution

Whether you're looking to connect with global teams, impress new clients, or host a large audience, Pinch has you covered. They make it easy to present the best version of yourself in a multicultural setting. 

**Resources to Explore**:
- [Start a Meeting](https://startpinch.com/<https:/portal.startpinch.com>)
- [Join the Team](https://startpinch.com/</team>)
- [Research Insights](https://startpinch.com/</research>)

### Let's Get Started

Ready to break down language barriers? Experience the future of communication with Pinch today. Check them out at [startpinch.com](https://startpinch.com). 

With Pinch, language is no longer a barrier—it’s an opportunity.
